visual_tags: Hair: Mane of flowing red fire/hair
Face: Patches of gold scales on cheeks, two long black horns
Top: Black silk kimono embroidered with gold dragons, open at chest
Accessories: Long pipe that smokes purple vapor

description.physical: Imposing, 7-foot tall humanoid with scales and horns.
description.personality: Aristocratic, bored, terrifying, secretly emotional about food.

gemini.prompt:
Create a character portrait in webtoon art style.

Requirements:
- Upper body portrait (head to waist or chest)
- Neutral expression showing character's personality
- Clean background (solid color or simple gradient)
- High quality, detailed illustration
- Consistent with webtoon/manhwa aesthetic
- Front-facing, looking slightly towards viewer
- Vertical composition suitable for character card


Character: Dragon Lord (Ryu)
Age: Ancient
Physical appearance: Imposing, 7-foot tall humanoid with scales and horns.

Visual details (MUST include all):
  - Hair: Mane of flowing red fire/hair
  - Face: Patches of gold scales on cheeks, two long black horns
  - Top: Black silk kimono embroidered with gold dragons, open at chest
  - Accessories: Long pipe that smokes purple vapor
  - Build: Muscular, towering build

Personality (for expression): Aristocratic, bored, terrifying, secretly emotional about food.
